title: R&D Internship
description: Executed and optimized test scripts for Air Traffic Control software, enhancing user experience and contributing to the on-time release of an updated software version.
Designed and developed an internal web application for Air Traffic Control using Node.js, Express.js, and ReactJS, integrating REST APIs for CRUD operations with a JSON file.
Deployed the web application as a Windows Service using WIX Toolset 3, and authored end-user and developer documentation to facilitate application usage and maintenance.

title: Web App Test Developer Internship
description: Enhanced UI/UX and implemented new features for an Android app using Java, enabling real-time display of signals received from a receiver device.
Conducted manual regression testing on various Rohde & Schwarz products, reducing the overall testing phase timeline.
Developed a web application for an Air Traffic Control (ATC) project, utilizing Node.js with Express.js for input conversion, ReactJS for an intuitive frontend, and integrated APIs using REST API.

title: University
location: Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD)
description: Graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering majoring in Computer Science and Design (CSD) with Software Engineering and Financial Technology Track Specialization.
